analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/39/0xf51684bccdcba1692e9117a7022e93ac3c512c2a.sol:
	Contract SuperSportCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/39/0xf51684bccdcba1692e9117a7022e93ac3c512c2a.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/39/0xf51684bccdcba1692e9117a7022e93ac3c512c2a.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
